name: Brutal Emulsion
description:
It's a Starry Night, and there's some cleaning up to do. 
Submitted as part of E1M1's "E1M1 Magazine Jam #2 - Retro FPS Jam!" under the theme "uncommon settings" Brutal Emulsion explores the world made from a work of art that we've all seen, but few have actually been, nonetheless with a mini-gun pistol loaded with paint tubes. Brutal Emulsion is a short experience due to external factors interfering with development during the jam, however we hope that you're able to see the same vision we had while developing the game. Thank you for trying it out!

"Every canvas is a journey all its own" - Helen Frankenthaler

Credits - 

  • Indie
  • Fire Plant Games
  • Low Poly Asset Bundle
